channel.title: How to make working ::jail and ::unjail! plz help
channel.description: Please i need this command that actual works..and also in my commands folder where do i put it after?

item.title: How to make working ::jail and ::unjail! plz help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Format changes slightly from source base to source base, something similar to this

if(cmd[0].equals("jail")) {
		Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1))));
		if (other != null) {
			other.tele(3037, 2978, 0);
			other.isTeleBlocked = true;
			other.sm("You have been jailed!");
		}
	} if(cmd[0].equals("unjail")) {
		Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1))));
			if (other != null) {
			other.tele(2712, 5354, 0);
			other.isTeleBlocked = false;
			other.sm("You have been unjailed, don't make the same mistake twice!");
		}
	}

add it in your commands file, probably client.java since you are using a 317.

Post it under the closing bracket of an exisiting command, but before the final bracket that ends the class.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make working ::jail and ::unjail! plz help
